head.supplied: Memorandum ¶ ¶ The Chief Secretary requests that Heads of Departments and others will afford every facility to his Excellency Field Marshal Baron Jochmus von Cotignola on presentation of this documen...

div.p: No. 2948, unit 23, p. 109, VPRS 1187/P outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's, Public Record Office, Victoria.

The Chief Secretary requests that Heads of Departments and others will afford every facility to his Excellency Field Marshal Baron Jochmus von Cotignola on presentation of this document to inspect the departments &c under their control and will also render His Excellency every assistance in their power in obtaining information concerning the public Institutions of the Colony.
See also M to A. Jochmus von Cotignola, 20 October 1870. Jochmus arrived in Melbourne on Somersetshire on 17 October 1870; see Argus, 18 October 1870, p. 4 (where, however, he is listed as Baron Jochmers).
